Surgery

We offer a state-of-the-art operating theatre, advanced surgical equipment, minimally-invasive surgery, thoracosopy, laparoscopy, and advanced orthopedics.

We have exceptionally high sterility and autoclaving standar ds including a B-class autoclave and highly trained theatre nurses, and our standards rival many of the human hospitals. If y ou are a pet owner , please talk to y our family veterinarian first if you would like to arrange a referral to CARE.
